body:
Comment 7 by **vendion**: 
When I upgraded from Go1 to Go1.0.1 here is what I did:

rm -rf /opt/go
wget http://go.googlecode.com/files/go1.0.1.src.tar.gz
sudo tar -C /opt go1.0.1.src.tar.gz
sudo chown -R vendion:users /opt/go
cd /opt/go/src
./all.bash

That should have put me in a clean Go1.0.1 install.  I had GOROOT and GOPATH already set
before building Go, and as for my PATH I have /opt/go/bin and /home/vendion/gocode/bin
(although this doesn't really matter as it is related to my GOPATH)
